member.name: T:OrchardCore.FileStorage.AmazonS3.AwsFileStore
member.summary: Provides an implementation that targets an underlying Amazon S3 Bucket account.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.FileStorage.AmazonS3.AwsStorageOptionsBase.BasePath
member.summary: The base directory path to use inside the container for this store's contents.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.FileStorage.AmazonS3.AwsStorageOptionsBase.CreateBucket
member.summary: Indicates if bucket should be created on module startup.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.FileStorage.AmazonS3.AwsStorageOptionsBase.AwsOptions
member.summary: Gets or sets the AWS Options.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.FileStorage.AmazonS3.AwsStorageOptionsBase.RemoveBucket
member.summary: Indicates if bucket should be removed on tenant removal.
